solution_line_template: On Tuesday, Adam bought {tuesday_multiplier} * {monday_apples} apples = <<{tuesday_multiplier}*{monday_apples}={tuesday_apples}>>{tuesday_apples} apples.
On Wednesday, Adam bought {wednesday_multiplier} * {tuesday_apples} apples = <<{wednesday_multiplier}*{tuesday_apples}={wednesday_apples}>>{wednesday_apples} apples.

Adam bought {monday_apples} apples + {tuesday_apples} apples + {wednesday_apples} apples = <<{monday_apples}+{tuesday_apples}+{wednesday_apples}={total_apples}>>{total_apples} apples on the three days.
